snippet: Following the deaths of the playwright Wendy Wasserstein and the composer Cy Coleman, many attempts have been made to bring “Pamela’s First Musical” to the stage.
abstract: Many attempts have been made to bring Wendy Wasserstein and Cy Coleman show Pamela's First Musical to the stage; show, which is based on Wasserstein's 1996 children's book of same name, is currently being produced by Two River Theater Co, but no premiere date has been scheduled.
lead_paragraph: Following the deaths of the playwright Wendy Wasserstein and the composer Cy Coleman, many attempts have been made to bring “Pamela’s First Musical” to the stage.

headline.seo: ‘Pamela’s First Musical’ Struggles to Raise Its Curtain
headline.main: A Playwright’s Well-Traveled Valentine to Broadway
headline.print_headline: Tenacious Shows Keep Seeking a Stage
